isDynamic

public boolean isDynamic()

setDynamic

public void setDynamic(boolean dynamic)
Set to true if attribute buffers will need to change in runtime (using "dirty" flags). Unless set to true internal typed arrays corresponding to buffers will be deleted once sent to GPU.
